content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #302

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 96

Submitted by @kensaku-kawamoto on behalf of @euvitudo from University of Utah

Chapter: Limitations
Section: https://cds-hooks.org/specification/1.0/
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

The specification requires that each CDS Service provider be registered (client_id, key-pair identifier) with the EHR Authorization Server, but does not dictate how registration is accomplished (e.g., dynamic vs. manual).

Comment:
client_id and key-pair identifier are not referenced or defined. Please add reference or definition.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #302

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 96

Submitted by @kensaku-kawamoto on behalf of @euvitudo from University of Utah

Chapter: Limitations
Section: https://cds-hooks.org/specification/1.0/
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

The specification requires that each CDS Service provider be registered (client_id, key-pair identifier) with the EHR Authorization Server, but does not dictate how registration is accomplished (e.g., dynamic vs. manual).

Comment:
client_id and key-pair identifier are not referenced or defined. Please add reference or definition.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #302

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will update the limitations section to note that CDS Services need to be registered with the EHR (not AS). Additionally, if the CDS Service accesses the FHIR server using the fhirAuthorization object, they will also need to be registered with the AS.

We will remove references to the client_id and keypair.

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #302

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
We will update the limitations section to note that CDS Services need to be registered with the EHR (not AS). Additionally, if the CDS Service accesses the FHIR server using the fhirAuthorization object, they will also need to be registered with the AS.

We will remove references to the client_id and keypair.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
